content.question: In the last sentence of the first paragraph, the author compares pleasure with flowers to

choices.label: hint that pleasure would be more common if it were cultivated more diligently
reinforce the idea that unanticipated pleasures are the most enjoyable ones
downplay the dangers of engaging excessively in pleasurable activities
argue that the experience of true pleasure is threatened by the increasingly hectic pace of life

content.answer: reinforce the idea that unanticipated pleasures are the most enjoyable ones

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
